segments.text: Yes . Do you have a pharmacy here , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . We have one on the second floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which floor are we on now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is the first floor . The second floor is one level up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's just over there . On the right .
segments.speaker: S1
